verses.verse: And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8761><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, If a soul <S%H5315><s%> shall sin <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> through ignorance <S%H7684><s%> against any of the Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> concerning things which ought not to be done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8735><s%>, and shall do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> against any <S%H259><s%> of them <S%H2007><s%>:

If the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> that is anointed <S%H4899><s%> do sin <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> according to the sin <S%H819><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>; then let him bring <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8689><s%> for his sin <S%H2403><s%>, which he hath sinned <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, a young <S%H1241><s%> <S%H1121><s%> bullock <S%H6499><s%> without blemish <S%H8549><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> for a sin offering <S%H2403><s%>.

And he shall bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the bullock <S%H6499><s%> unto the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>; and shall lay <S%H5564><s%> <S%H8804><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> upon the bullock's <S%H6499><s%> head <S%H7218><s%>, and kill <S%H7819><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the bullock <S%H6499><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> that is anointed <S%H4899><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of the bullock's <S%H6499><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%>, and bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> it to the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>:

And the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> shall dip <S%H2881><s%> <S%H8804><s%> his finger <S%H676><s%> in the blood <S%H1818><s%>, and sprinkle <S%H5137><s%> <S%H8689><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> times <S%H6471><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, before <S%H6440><s%> the vail <S%H6532><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>.

And the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> shall put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> some of the blood <S%H1818><s%> upon the shofars <S%H7161><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> of sweet <S%H5561><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, which is in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>; and shall pour <S%H8210><s%> <S%H8799><s%> all the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the bullock <S%H6499><s%> at the bottom <S%H3247><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>, which is at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>.

And he shall take off <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8686><s%> from it all the fat <S%H2459><s%> of the bullock <S%H6499><s%> for the sin offering <S%H2403><s%>; the fat <S%H2459><s%> that covereth <S%H3680><s%> <S%H8764><s%> the inwards <S%H7130><s%>, and all the fat <S%H2459><s%> that is upon the inwards <S%H7130><s%>,

And the two <S%H8147><s%> kidneys <S%H3629><s%>, and the fat <S%H2459><s%> that is upon them, which is by the flanks <S%H3689><s%>, and the caul <S%H3508><s%> above the liver <S%H3516><s%>, with the kidneys <S%H3629><s%>, it shall he take away <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8686><s%>,

As it was taken off <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8714><s%> from the bullock <S%H7794><s%> of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace offerings <S%H8002><s%>: and the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> shall burn <S%H6999><s%> <S%H8689><s%> them upon the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>.

And the skin <S%H5785><s%> of the bullock <S%H6499><s%>, and all his flesh <S%H1320><s%>, with his head <S%H7218><s%>, and with his legs <S%H3767><s%>, and his inwards <S%H7130><s%>, and his dung <S%H6569><s%>,

Havahn the whole bullock <S%H6499><s%> shall he carry forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8689><s%> without <S%H2351><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%> unto a clean <S%H2889><s%> place <S%H4725><s%>, where the ashes <S%H1880><s%> are poured out <S%H8211><s%>, and burn <S%H8313><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him on the wood <S%H6086><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>: where <S%H413><s%> the ashes <S%H1880><s%> are poured out <S%H8211><s%> shall he be burnt <S%H8313><s%> <S%H8735><s%>.

And if the whole congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> sin through ignorance <S%H7686><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and the thing <S%H1697><s%> be hid <S%H5956><s%> <S%H8738><s%> from the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the assembly <S%H6951><s%>, and they have done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> somewhat against any <S%H259><s%> of the Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> concerning things which should not be done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8735><s%>, and are guilty <S%H816><s%> <S%H8804><s%>;

When the sin <S%H2403><s%>, which they have sinned <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> against it, is known <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8738><s%>, then the congregation <S%H6951><s%> shall offer <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8689><s%> a young <S%H1241><s%> <S%H1121><s%> bullock <S%H6499><s%> for the sin <S%H2403><s%>, and bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> him before <S%H6440><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>.

And the elders <S%H2205><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%> shall lay <S%H5564><s%> <S%H8804><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> upon the head <S%H7218><s%> of the bullock <S%H6499><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>: and the bullock <S%H6499><s%> shall be killed <S%H7819><s%> <S%H8804><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> that is anointed <S%H4899><s%> shall bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> of the bullock's <S%H6499><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> to the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>:

And the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> shall dip <S%H2881><s%> <S%H8804><s%> his finger <S%H676><s%> in some of the blood <S%H1818><s%>, and sprinkle <S%H5137><s%> <S%H8689><s%> it seven <S%H7651><s%> times <S%H6471><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, even before <S%H6440><s%> the vail <S%H6532><s%>.

And he shall put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> some of the blood <S%H1818><s%> upon the shofars <S%H7161><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> which is before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, that is in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, and shall pour out <S%H8210><s%> <S%H8799><s%> all the blood <S%H1818><s%> at the bottom <S%H3247><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>, which is at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>.
And he shall take <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8686><s%> all his fat <S%H2459><s%> from him, and burn <S%H6999><s%> <S%H8689><s%> it upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>.

And he shall do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with the bullock <S%H6499><s%> as he did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with the bullock <S%H6499><s%> for a sin offering <S%H2403><s%>, so shall he do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with this: and the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> shall make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> <S%H8765><s%> for them, and it shall be forgiven <S%H5545><s%> <S%H8738><s%> them.

And he shall carry forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the bullock <S%H6499><s%> without <S%H2351><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%>, and burn <S%H8313><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him as he burned <S%H8313><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the first <S%H7223><s%> bullock <S%H6499><s%>: it is a sin offering <S%H2403><s%> for the congregation <S%H6951><s%>.

When a ruler <S%H5387><s%> hath sinned <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> somewhat through ignorance <S%H7684><s%> against any <S%H259><s%> of the Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> his 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> concerning things which should not be done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8735><s%>, and is guilty <S%H816><s%> <S%H8804><s%>;

Or if his sin <S%H2403><s%>, wherein he hath sinned <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, come to his knowledge <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8717><s%>; he shall bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> his offering <S%H7133><s%>, a kid <S%H8163><s%> of the goats <S%H5795><s%>, a male <S%H2145><s%> without blemish <S%H8549><s%>:

And he shall lay <S%H5564><s%> <S%H8804><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> upon the head <S%H7218><s%> of the goat <S%H8163><s%>, and kill <S%H7819><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it in the place <S%H4725><s%> where they kill <S%H7819><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>: it is a sin offering <S%H2403><s%>.

And the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the sin offering <S%H2403><s%> with his finger <S%H676><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it upon the shofars <S%H7161><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>, and shall pour out <S%H8210><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his blood <S%H1818><s%> at the bottom <S%H3247><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>.

And he shall burn <S%H6999><s%> <S%H8686><s%> all his fat <S%H2459><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>, as the fat <S%H2459><s%> of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace offerings <S%H8002><s%>: and the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> shall make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> <S%H8765><s%> for him as concerning his sin <S%H2403><s%>, and it shall be forgiven <S%H5545><s%> <S%H8738><s%> him.

And if any <S%H259><s%> one <S%H5315><s%> of the common <S%H776><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> sin <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> through ignorance <S%H7684><s%>, while he doeth <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> somewhat against any <S%H259><s%> of the Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> concerning things which ought not to be done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8735><s%>, and be guilty <S%H816><s%> <S%H8804><s%>;

Or if his sin <S%H2403><s%>, which he hath sinned <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, come to his knowledge <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8717><s%>: then he shall bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> his offering <S%H7133><s%>, a kid <S%H8166><s%> of the goats <S%H5795><s%>, a female <S%H5347><s%> without blemish <S%H8549><s%>, for his sin <S%H2403><s%> which he hath sinned <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

And he shall lay <S%H5564><s%> <S%H8804><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> upon the head <S%H7218><s%> of the sin offering <S%H2403><s%>, and slay <S%H7819><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the sin offering <S%H2403><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> of the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>.

And the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> thereof with his finger <S%H676><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it upon the shofars <S%H7161><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>, and shall pour out <S%H8210><s%> <S%H8799><s%> all the blood <S%H1818><s%> thereof at the bottom <S%H3247><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%>.

And he shall take away <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8686><s%> all the fat <S%H2459><s%> thereof, as the fat <S%H2459><s%> is taken away <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8717><s%> from off the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace offerings <S%H8002><s%>; and the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> shall burn <S%H6999><s%> <S%H8689><s%> it upon the altar <S%H4196><s%> for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savour <S%H7381><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>; and the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> shall make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> <S%H8765><s%> for him, and it shall be forgiven <S%H5545><s%> <S%H8738><s%> him.

And if he bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> a lamb <S%H3532><s%> for a sin <S%H2403><s%> offering <S%H7133><s%>, he shall bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> it a female <S%H5347><s%> without blemish <S%H8549><s%>.

And he shall lay <S%H5564><s%> <S%H8804><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> upon the head <S%H7218><s%> of the sin offering <S%H2403><s%>, and slay <S%H7819><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it for a sin offering <S%H2403><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> where they kill <S%H7819><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>.

And the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the sin offering <S%H2403><s%> with his finger <S%H676><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it upon the shofars <S%H7161><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>, and shall pour out <S%H8210><s%> <S%H8799><s%> all the blood <S%H1818><s%> thereof at the bottom <S%H3247><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%>:

And he shall take away <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8686><s%> all the fat <S%H2459><s%> thereof, as the fat <S%H2459><s%> of the lamb <S%H3775><s%> is taken away <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8714><s%> from the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of the peace offerings <S%H8002><s%>; and the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> shall burn <S%H6999><s%> <S%H8689><s%> them upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>, according to the offerings made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>: and the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> shall make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> <S%H8765><s%> for his sin <S%H2403><s%> that he hath committed <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and it shall be forgiven <S%H5545><s%> <S%H8738><s%> him.
